name: create_seed_card
description: Generates a fully detailed Seed Card from a provided Seed Idea and relevant article content. The Seed Card guides the Drafting Agent in creating a high-quality article.

idea_id.description: The unique identifier of the Seed Idea.

idea_title.description: The title of the Seed Idea, carried over from the Seed Idea input.

time_frame.description: A relevant date range inferred from the article content or the Seed Idea, e.g. '2025-05-25 to 2025-05-31'.

topic.description: The main topic of the Seed Idea.

news_angle.description: A brief explanation of the central news angle or controversy.

key_articles.description: List of relevant article titles with their IDs.

article_id.description: The unique ID of the article.

data_points.description: Relevant statistics, figures, or factual information extracted from the article content.

potential_quotes.description: Direct quotes (or paraphrased lines) from the article content.

editorial_tone.description: Recommended tone for the article (e.g., analytical, explanatory, investigative).

suggested_structure.description: A suggested outline (sections) for the article.

potential_conflicts_or_biases.description: Notes on conflicting data, potential ideological biases, or discrepancies among sources.
